content: Hello, James Smith. I'm pleased to have you here. Indeed, we shall discuss the rental price of this fine apartment. How much were you considering to offer?

name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: James Smith, your offer of 500 Euros per month is quite generous, but I must confess, it does not meet my expectations for this property. content: James Smith, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.
